title: Historical Performance of Veeva Systems Inc during Economic Recessions and Recoveries

content.text: Veeva Systems Inc is a cloud-computing company that provides industry-specific business software solutions for the life sciences industry. The company offers products and services aimed at streamlining processes related to the development, manufacturing, and commercialization of pharmaceuticals and other life sciences products.

During economic recessions, the stock market as a whole tends to experience declines, and individual stocks are not immune to these market-wide downturns. Veeva Systems Inc began trading publicly in 2013, so its performance during previous recessions is limited to the relatively short span of time since then.

One notable economic downturn during Veeva Systems' trading history was the recession that occurred from late 2018 to early 2019. The stock market faced significant volatility during this period, with major indices experiencing declines. Veeva Systems Inc stock was not immune to this downturn and experienced a decline, although the extent of the decline varied compared to the overall market.

During economic recoveries, the stock market typically shows signs of improvement, and individual stocks may experience growth as business conditions improve. Veeva Systems Inc has shown resilience and growth since its IPO in 2013, and its stock performance during recoveries has generally been positive. However, the extent and timing of any growth or decline in its stock price during recoveries can vary based on a multitude of factors, including market conditions and investor sentiment.

Veeva Systems Inc is a cloud-computing company focused on the life sciences industry. While its trading history is relatively short, it has experienced at least one economic recession since going public. During this recession, its stock price declined, but the extent of the decline varied compared to the overall market. In general, the company has shown growth and resilience during economic recoveries. However, it is important to consider various factors that can influence stock performance during different economic cycles.

news.headline: Boehringer Ingelheim Partners with Veeva to Advance its Clinical and Regulatory Operations in Animal Health
news.summary: Veeva Systems (NYSE: VEEV) today announced that Boehringer Ingelheim has selected Veeva Vault Clinical and Veeva Vault RIM applications as its technology foundation for clinical and regulatory management in its animal health business unit. By adopting unified applications on a single platform, Boehringer Ingelheim can streamline clinical execution to speed development of new medicines that help animals live healthier and happier lives.

news.headline: New Veeva Vault Submissions Publishing eLearning Application Speeds Employee Onboarding
news.summary: DIA RSIDM 2024 — Veeva Systems (NYSE: VEEV) today announced Veeva Vault Submissions Publishing eLearning, a new regulatory information management (RIM) application that educates users on key publishing processes for seamless development of compliant content. With on-demand process-based training, companies can quickly onboard employees to use Veeva Vault Submissions Publishing while increasing time to value.

news.headline: Veeva to Release Fiscal 2024 Fourth Quarter and Full Year Results on February 29, 2024
news.summary: Veeva Systems (NYSE: VEEV) will announce financial results for its fourth quarter and full fiscal year, which ended January 31, 2024, after market close on February 29, 2024. Veeva will host a conference call and webcast that day at 2:00 p.m. PT (5:00 p.m. ET) to discuss its financial results.
